H0.text: What is the Scottish word that applies to New Year's Eve. Ne'erday

H1.text: What is the Scottish word that applies to New Year's Eve. Sowens

H3.text: What is the Scottish word that applies to New Year's Eve. Hogmany

A4.text: Hogmanay is the Scots word for the last day of the old year and is synonymous with the celebration of the New Year in the Scottish manner.

A5.text: The period of festivities running from Christmas to Handsel Monday, including Hogmanay and Ne'erday, is known as the Daft Days.
